name: Carnival King
overview: Step right up for a frantically fun, arcade-style, big top shooter. Carnival King is a fun-for-all ages video game that brings the spirit and energy of competitive carnival games to the screen. Players compete for top scores and prizes while visiting three different amusement parks: Arcadia, Dreamland and Lagoon Park. Each park has four sets of games and a Bonus Round that test the speed and accuracy of a player's shooting skills. Whether a novice or a sharpshooter, the games are continually challenging, and the difficulty level can be adjusted to match the player's growing confidence.
